title: The One Where Dr. Remore Dies

questions.question: What is the name of the character that says 'I'm sorry Amber. It's just like Brad to have to have the last word.'?
options: Dr. Remore
Dr. Horton
Dr. Wong
Joey Tribbiani
questions.correct_answer: Dr. Remore
questions.explanation: Dr. Remore says this line in response to Amber's declaration of love.

questions.question: What is the name of the award that Joey claims to have received?
options: Medical award for separating the siamese twins
Award for best actor
Award for best doctor
Award for most creative writing
questions.correct_answer: Medical award for separating the siamese twins
questions.explanation: Joey mentions this award while discussing his role on Days of Our Lives.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe refuse to play foosball with Chandler?
options: Because she thinks it's a waste of time
Because she's not good at it
Because she thinks it's a human-rights violation
Because she's allergic to the table
questions.correct_answer: Because she thinks it's a human-rights violation
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that the game is 'grotesque' and compares it to a human-rights violation.

questions.question: What is the name of Eddie's ex-girlfriend?
options: Tilly
Monica
Rachel
Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: Tilly
questions.explanation: Eddie mentions Tilly as his ex-girlfriend in a conversation with Chandler.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that Phoebe sings at Central Perk?
options: And a crusty old man said I'll do what I can and the rest of the rats played moroccas
Smelly cat
Sticky shoes
Ode to a pubic hair
questions.correct_answer: And a crusty old man said I'll do what I can and the rest of the rats played moroccas
questions.explanation: Phoebe sings this song at Central Perk, and the lyrics are mentioned in the transcript.

questions.question: How many women has Richard been with?
questions.explanation: Richard tells Monica that he has only been with two women, including his wife Barbara.

questions.question: What is the reason for Dr. Remore's death?
options: He falls down an elevator shaft
He gets shot
He dies of a heart attack
He gets poisoned
questions.correct_answer: He falls down an elevator shaft
questions.explanation: Dr. Remore's death is shown on the TV as the friends are watching Days of Our Lives.

questions.question: Why is Ross jealous of Paolo?
options: Because Paolo is better looking than him
Because Paolo is more successful than him
Because Paolo had a more intense physical relationship with Rachel
Because Paolo is more intelligent than him
questions.correct_answer: Because Paolo had a more intense physical relationship with Rachel
questions.explanation: Ross is jealous of Paolo because Rachel mentions that their relationship was 'good' and implies that it was more intense than her relationship with Ross.

questions.question: What is the name of the magazine that Joey is featured in?
options: Soap Opera Digest
People Magazine
US Weekly
Entertainment Weekly
questions.correct_answer: Soap Opera Digest
questions.explanation: Joey shows his friends a copy of Soap Opera Digest, which features him on the cover.

questions.question: Why does Chandler throw a cookie across the room?
options: Because it's a raisin cookie and he doesn't like raisins
Because it's a pecan cookie and he's allergic to pecans
Because Eddie is trying to poison him
Because Eddie is being creepy and Chandler is frustrated
questions.correct_answer: Because Eddie is being creepy and Chandler is frustrated
questions.explanation: Chandler throws the cookie because he's frustrated with Eddie's behavior and finds him creepy.

questions.question: What is the name of the fish that Eddie claims Chandler killed?
options: Buddy
Chandler
Goldie
Finley
questions.correct_answer: Buddy
questions.explanation: Eddie accuses Chandler of killing his fish, Buddy.

questions.question: Why does Monica and Rachel's conversation about their past relationships become awkward?
options: Because Monica reveals that she has been with a lot of men
Because Rachel reveals that she has been with a lot of men
Because Monica and Rachel start arguing about their relationships
Because Richard asks Monica about her past relationships
questions.correct_answer: Because Monica reveals that she has been with a lot of men
questions.explanation: Monica and Rachel's conversation becomes awkward when Monica reveals that she has been with a lot of men, and Richard asks her about it.

questions.question: What is the reason for Joey's death on Days of Our Lives?
options: He falls down an elevator shaft
He gets shot
He dies of a heart attack
He gets poisoned
questions.correct_answer: He falls down an elevator shaft
questions.explanation: Joey's character on Days of Our Lives dies after falling down an elevator shaft.

questions.question: How does Phoebe try to comfort Joey after his character's death?
options: She tells him that he's still a great actor
She tells him that he'll find another role
She tells him that the show was just a dumb soap opera
She tells him that he's pre-approved with his friends
questions.correct_answer: She tells him that the show was just a dumb soap opera
questions.explanation: Phoebe tries to comfort Joey by telling him that the show was just a dumb soap opera and that he doesn't need it.

questions.question: What is the surprise that Eddie has for Chandler?
options: A new fish
A batch of cookies
A gift card
A apology
questions.correct_answer: A batch of cookies
questions.explanation: Eddie surprises Chandler with a tray of cookies, which he claims are pecan sandy.

questions.question: Why does Chandler want to move out of the apartment?
options: Because Eddie is being creepy
Because the apartment is too small
Because the rent is too high
Because he wants to live with Monica and Rachel
questions.correct_answer: Because Eddie is being creepy
questions.explanation: Chandler wants to move out of the apartment because he finds Eddie's behavior creepy and uncomfortable.

questions.question: What is the name of the game that Monica and Rachel play to decide who gets the last condom?
options: Rock-paper-scissors
Coin toss
Drawing straws
Guessing game
questions.correct_answer: Rock-paper-scissors
questions.explanation: Monica and Rachel play rock-paper-scissors to decide who gets the last condom.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's awkward encounter with Richard?
options: Because they both wore the same bathrobe
Because they both wanted to use the bathroom at the same time
Because they both had a fight with their girlfriends
Because they both wanted to watch the same TV show
questions.correct_answer: Because they both wore the same bathrobe
questions.explanation: Ross and Richard have an awkward encounter because they both come out of their girlfriends' bedrooms wearing the same bathrobe.

questions.question: What is the final scene of the episode?
options: Ross and Rachel in bed together
Monica and Richard in bed together
Joey watching TV alone
Ross and Richard agreeing not to speak about their encounter
questions.correct_answer: Ross and Richard agreeing not to speak about their encounter
questions.explanation: The final scene of the episode shows Ross and Richard agreeing not to speak about their awkward encounter.

questions.question: What is the name of the character that says 'You're gonna be fine, you don't need that show, it was just a dumb soap opera'?
options: Phoebe
Monica
Rachel
Chandler
questions.correct_answer: Phoebe
questions.explanation: Phoebe tries to comfort Joey by telling him that he doesn't need the show and that it was just a dumb soap opera.

questions.question: Why does Joey say that he's pre-approved with his friends?
options: Because they accept him for who he is
Because they think he's a great actor
Because they feel sorry for him
Because they want to help him get a new role
questions.correct_answer: Because they accept him for who he is
questions.explanation: Joey says that he's pre-approved with his friends because they accept him for who he is, unlike the soap opera where he had to follow a script.

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's initial reluctance to tell Richard about her past relationships?
options: Because she's embarrassed about her past
Because she's afraid of being judged
Because she's not sure if Richard is ready for a serious relationship
Because she's trying to protect Richard's feelings
questions.correct_answer: Because she's afraid of being judged
questions.explanation: Monica is initially reluctant to tell Richard about her past relationships because she's afraid of being judged or rejected.

questions.question: What is the name of the award that Joey claims to have won?
options: Medical award for separating the siamese twins
Award for best actor
Award for best doctor
Award for most creative writing
questions.correct_answer: Medical award for separating the siamese twins
questions.explanation: Joey claims to have won a medical award for separating the siamese twins, which is mentioned in the transcript.

questions.question: Why does Eddie accuse Chandler of killing his fish?
options: Because Chandler admitted to killing the fish
Because Eddie found evidence of Chandler killing the fish
Because Chandler was acting suspiciously around the fish tank
Because Eddie is trying to manipulate Chandler
questions.correct_answer: Because Eddie is trying to manipulate Chandler
questions.explanation: Eddie accuses Chandler of killing his fish as a way to manipulate him and make him feel guilty.

questions.question: What is the name of the character that says 'I'm fine' in response to Monica's question about her past relationships?
options: Richard
Ross
Joey
Chandler
questions.correct_answer: Richard
questions.explanation: Richard says 'I'm fine' in response to Monica's question about her past relationships, indicating that he's not bothered by her past.

questions.question: Why does Rachel try to comfort Ross after his awkward encounter with Richard?
options: Because she feels sorry for him
Because she's trying to distract him from his jealousy
Because she wants to reassure him that she loves him
Because she's trying to make him feel better about his relationship with her
questions.correct_answer: Because she wants to reassure him that she loves him
questions.explanation: Rachel tries to comfort Ross by reassuring him that she loves him and that their relationship is special.
